content:
https://www.lboro.ac.uk/departments/mec/events/2022/learningmathematicswithlean/

Free to attend, in person conference organised by education specialists. @Gihan Marasingha and @Jeremy Avigad me are speaking (I assume Jeremy on Zoom?? but I'll be there in person, as will some of the students from my course).
Indeed, I'll be participating by Zoom. I like the title of Kevin's talk!
Looks very interesting! Will the talks be recorded? I won't be able to attend, what with the time difference.
